headline: The Bull Case For Capital One (COF) Could Change Following Trump’s Proposed 10% Card APR Cap - Learn Why
summary: In recent days, Capital One Financial has come under pressure after President Trump proposed a one-year 10% cap on credit card interest rates, raising fresh regulatory uncertainty for the entire card industry. Analysts now see the political spotlight on credit costs as a material risk factor for card issuers, even if the proposal is ultimately unlikely to take effect because of legal and legislative hurdles. We’ll now examine how this renewed regulatory risk, particularly the proposed 10%...
